Package ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder

Interface Summary
Dialect Interface representing a SQL dialect.
ExistsPredicate Predicate used to add an EXISTS clause to the where clause.
Predicate Component in the where clause of a SelectCreator, UpdateCreator, or DeleteCreator.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSqlBuilder Abstract base class for builders.
AbstractSqlCreator Abstract base class of SQL creator classes.
DeleteBuilder Builder for creating SQL delete statements.
DeleteCreator A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like a DeleteBuilder.
ExistsPredicateImpl  
InsertBuilder Builder for building SQL insert statements.
InsertCreator A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like an InsertBuilder.
ParameterizedPreparedStatementCreator Implementation of Spring's PreparedStatementCreator that allows for the substitution of named parameters.
PostgresqlDialect Dialect for PostgreSQL.
Predicates Collection of commonly used predicates, implemented by static methods.
SelectBuilder Tool for programmatically constructing SQL select statements.
SelectCreator A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like a SelectBuilder.
SubSelectBuilder SelectBuilder that can be used as a sub-select in a column expression or FROM clause.
SubSelectCreator Creator for part of a SQL sub-select statement used as a column expression or a FROM clause.
UnionSelectCreator Creator for part of a SQL select statement that comes after the UNION keyword.
UpdateBuilder Builder for creating SQL update statements.
UpdateCreator A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like an UpdateBuilder.
